SEARCH
Package env.objects.structures

Class MapStructure

java.lang.Object
env.objects.structures.MapStructure
Direct Known Subclasses:
BreakableStructure, Bridge, Empty, Wall
public abstract class MapStructure extends Object
The base class for all map structures (e.g., walls, gates, bridges, trees). Defines common properties and behaviors shared by all structures.

  • Constructor Details

    • MapStructure

      public MapStructure(String name, boolean breakable, boolean repairable, Boolean walkable, int max_hp, Boolean team, Pose pose)
      Constructs a new MapStructure with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the structure.
      breakable - true if the structure can be destroyed, false otherwise.
      repairable - true if the structure can be repaired, false otherwise.
      walkable - true if agents can walk through the structure (when it satisfies some conditions), false otherwise.
      max_hp - the maximum hit points of the structure.
      team - the team this structure belongs to (can be null for neutral structures).
      pose - the initial position and orientation of the structure.
